item.title: Spellings for 2EE
item.description: Dear Parents Please find below the spellings for next Thursday’s spelling test in Class 2EE. one two three four five six seven eight nine ten The children completed a spelling assessment yesterday and I will be marking it over the weekend so that we can provide differentiated levels of spellings from next week. Apologies for the delay in these reaching you, I thought schoolbase had sent this to you previously.
